Settings.QueryText: SELECT DocumentSalesInvoice.Ref AS Ref, DocumentSalesInvoice.DeletionMark AS DeletionMark, DocumentSalesInvoice.Number AS Number, DocumentSalesInvoice.Date AS Date, DocumentSalesInvoice.Posted AS Posted, DocumentSalesInvoice.Author AS Author, DocumentSalesInvoice.BankAccount AS BankAccount, DocumentSalesInvoice.CounterpartyBankAcc AS CounterpartyBankAcc, DocumentSalesInvoice.CarrierBankAccount AS CarrierBankAccount, DocumentSalesInvoice.DocumentCurrency AS DocumentCurrency, DocumentSalesInvoice.DiscountMarkupKind AS DiscountMarkupKind, DocumentSalesInvoice.PriceKind AS PriceKind, DocumentSalesInvoice.Driver AS Driver, DocumentSalesInvoice.ChiefAccountant AS ChiefAccountant, DocumentSalesInvoice.Consignor AS Consignor, DocumentSalesInvoice.Consignee AS Consignee, DocumentSalesInvoice.IncomingDocumentDate AS IncomingDocumentDate, DocumentSalesInvoice.Contract AS Contract, DocumentSalesInvoice.BasisDocument AS BasisDocument, DocumentSalesInvoice.Order AS Order, DocumentSalesInvoice.Comment AS Comment, DocumentSalesInvoice.Counterparty AS Counterparty, DocumentSalesInvoice.Multiplicity AS Multiplicity, DocumentSalesInvoice.ExchangeRate AS ExchangeRate, DocumentSalesInvoice.VATTaxation AS VATTaxation, DocumentSalesInvoice.IncludeVATInPrice AS IncludeVATInPrice, DocumentSalesInvoice.IncomingDocumentNumber AS IncomingDocumentNumber, DocumentSalesInvoice.Company AS Company, DocumentSalesInvoice.Responsible AS Responsible, DocumentSalesInvoice.Released AS Released, DocumentSalesInvoice.ReleasedPosition AS ReleasedPosition, DocumentSalesInvoice.Carrier AS Carrier, DocumentSalesInvoice.Department AS Department, DocumentSalesInvoice.SalesOrderPosition AS SalesOrderPosition, DocumentSalesInvoice.DeliveryTerm AS DeliveryTerm, DocumentSalesInvoice.StructuralUnit AS StructuralUnit, DocumentSalesInvoice.AmountIncludesVAT AS AmountIncludesVAT, DocumentSalesInvoice.DocumentAmount AS DocumentAmount, DocumentSalesInvoice.Cell AS Cell, DocumentSalesInvoice.DiscountCard AS DiscountCard, DocumentSalesInvoice.DiscountPercentByDiscountCard AS DiscountPercentByDiscountCard, DocumentSalesInvoice.DiscountsAreCalculated AS DiscountsAreCalculated, DocumentSalesInvoice.CashAssetsType AS CashAssetsType, DocumentSalesInvoice.PettyCash AS PettyCash, DocumentSalesInvoice.SetPaymentTerms AS SetPaymentTerms, DocumentSalesInvoice.ShippingAddress AS ShippingAddress, DocumentSalesInvoice.ContactPerson AS ContactPerson, DocumentSalesInvoice.Incoterms AS Incoterms, DocumentSalesInvoice.DeliveryTimeFrom AS DeliveryTimeFrom, DocumentSalesInvoice.DeliveryTimeTo AS DeliveryTimeTo, DocumentSalesInvoice.GoodsMarking AS GoodsMarking, DocumentSalesInvoice.LogisticsCompany AS LogisticsCompany, DocumentSalesInvoice.DeliveryOption AS DeliveryOption, ISNULL(InvoicesPaymentStatuses.Status, VALUE(Enum.InvoicesPaymentStatuses.Unpaid)) AS PaymentStatus FROM Document.SalesInvoice AS DocumentSalesInvoice LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.InvoicesPaymentStatuses AS InvoicesPaymentStatuses ON (InvoicesPaymentStatuses.Document = DocumentSalesInvoice.Ref)

SELECT DocumentSalesOrder.Ref, DocumentSalesOrder.DeletionMark, DocumentSalesOrder.Number, DocumentSalesOrder.Date, DocumentSalesOrder.Posted, DocumentSalesOrder.Author, DocumentSalesOrder.BankAccount, DocumentSalesOrder.DocumentCurrency, DocumentSalesOrder.OperationKind, DocumentSalesOrder.WorkKind, DocumentSalesOrder.DiscountMarkupKind, DocumentSalesOrder.PriceKind, DocumentSalesOrder.ShipmentDate, DocumentSalesOrder.Contract, DocumentSalesOrder.Closed, DocumentSalesOrder.SetPaymentTerms, DocumentSalesOrder.PettyCash, DocumentSalesOrder.Comment, DocumentSalesOrder.Counterparty, DocumentSalesOrder.Multiplicity, DocumentSalesOrder.ExchangeRate, DocumentSalesOrder.IncludeVATInPrice, DocumentSalesOrder.Company, DocumentSalesOrder.Responsible, DocumentSalesOrder.Project, DocumentSalesOrder.Event, DocumentSalesOrder.OrderState, CASE WHEN (DocumentSalesOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) OR DocumentSalesOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess)) AND Not DocumentSalesOrder.Closed THEN "In process" ELSE CASE WHEN DocumentSalesOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Completed) THEN "Completed" ELSE "Canceled" END END AS OrderStatus, DocumentSalesOrder.Start, DocumentSalesOrder.SalesStructuralUnit, DocumentSalesOrder.StructuralUnitReserve, DocumentSalesOrder.AmountIncludesVAT, DocumentSalesOrder.DocumentAmount, DocumentSalesOrder.CashAssetsType, DocumentSalesOrder.Finish, DocumentSalesOrder.Cell, DocumentSalesOrder.PointInTime, SalesOrdersBalances.QuantityBalance FROM AccumulationRegister.SalesOrders.Balance( , (SalesOrder.OperationKind = VALUE(Enum.OperationTypesSalesOrder.OrderForSale) OR SalesOrder.OperationKind = VALUE(Enum.OperationTypesSalesOrder.OrderForProcessing)) AND Products.ProductsType = VALUE(Enum.ProductsTypes.InventoryItem)) AS SalesOrdersBalances LEFT JOIN Document.SalesOrder AS DocumentSalesOrder ON SalesOrdersBalances.SalesOrder = DocumentSalesOrder.Ref WHERE SalesOrdersBalances.QuantityBalance > 0 AND Not DocumentSalesOrder.Closed

SELECT WorkOrderDocument.Ref AS Ref, WorkOrderDocument.DeletionMark AS DeletionMark, WorkOrderDocument.Number AS Number, WorkOrderDocument.Date AS Date, WorkOrderDocument.Posted AS Posted, WorkOrderDocument.Author AS Author, WorkOrderDocument.BankAccount AS BankAccount, WorkOrderDocument.DocumentCurrency AS DocumentCurrency, WorkOrderDocument.WorkKind AS WorkKind, WorkOrderDocument.DiscountMarkupKind AS DiscountMarkupKind, WorkOrderDocument.PriceKind AS PriceKind, WorkOrderDocument.Contract AS Contract, WorkOrderDocument.Closed AS Closed, WorkOrderDocument.SetPaymentTerms AS SetPaymentTerms, WorkOrderDocument.PettyCash AS PettyCash, WorkOrderDocument.Comment AS Comment, WorkOrderDocument.Counterparty AS Counterparty, WorkOrderDocument.Multiplicity AS Multiplicity, WorkOrderDocument.ExchangeRate AS ExchangeRate, WorkOrderDocument.IncludeVATInPrice AS IncludeVATInPrice, WorkOrderDocument.Company AS Company, WorkOrderDocument.Responsible AS Responsible, WorkOrderDocument.Project AS Project, WorkOrderDocument.Event AS Event, WorkOrderDocument.OrderState AS OrderState, CASE WHEN (WorkOrderDocument.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) OR WorkOrderDocument.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess)) AND NOT WorkOrderDocument.Closed THEN "In process" ELSE CASE WHEN WorkOrderDocument.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Completed) THEN "Completed" ELSE "Canceled" END END AS OrderStatus, WorkOrderDocument.Start AS Start, WorkOrderDocument.SalesStructuralUnit AS SalesStructuralUnit, WorkOrderDocument.StructuralUnitReserve AS StructuralUnitReserve, WorkOrderDocument.AmountIncludesVAT AS AmountIncludesVAT, WorkOrderDocument.DocumentAmount AS DocumentAmount, WorkOrderDocument.CashAssetsType AS CashAssetsType, WorkOrderDocument.Finish AS Finish, WorkOrderDocument.PointInTime AS PointInTime, WorkOrdersBalance.QuantityBalance AS QuantityBalance FROM AccumulationRegister.WorkOrders.Balance(, ) AS WorkOrdersBalance, Document.WorkOrder AS WorkOrderDocument WHERE WorkOrdersBalance.QuantityBalance > 0 AND NOT WorkOrderDocument.Closed

v8:item.v8:content: Create sales invoice based on WO
